languages.text: "Металлолом и шашки. Ну конечно. Каждый хладный торговец обязан хоть раз обобрать орка".

traits.locale_text: "Металлолом и шашки. Ну конечно. Каждый Хладный Торговец обязан хоть раз обобрать орка".

languages.text: "Scrap metal and chequered patterns. But of course. It's an unspoken rite of passage for a Cold Trader to fleece an Ork at least once."
languages.original_text: "Металлолом и шашки. Ну конечно. Каждый хладный торговец обязан хоть раз обобрать орка".

traits.locale_text: "Scrap metal and chequered patterns. But of course. It's an unspoken rite of passage for a Cold Trader to fleece an Ork at least once."
"Scrap metal and checker patterns. But of course. Every cold trader is supposed to knock over an Ork at least once."
"Scrap metal and chequered patterns. But of course. It's an unspoken rite of passage for a Cold Trader to fleece an Ork at least once."
"Scrap metal and chequered patterns. But of course. It's an unspoken rite of passage for a Cold Trader to fleece an Ork at least once."
"Scrap metal and chequered patterns. But of course. It's an unspoken rite of passage for a Cold Trader to fleece an Ork at least once."

languages.text: 「金属のスクラップとチェック模様。思ったとおりだわ。闇商人がオルクから一度お金を巻き上げるのは、暗黙の通過儀礼のようなものなのよ」
languages.original_text: "Scrap metal and chequered patterns. But of course. It's an unspoken rite of passage for a Cold Trader to fleece an Ork at least once."

traits.locale_text: 「金属のスクラップとチェック模様。思ったとおりだわ。闇商人がオルクから一度お金を巻き上げるのは、暗黙の通過儀礼のようなものなのよ」

languages.text: «Chatarra con diseño a cuadros. Claro. Cualquier Comerciante Frío que se precie ha estado al menos una vez a un orko».
languages.original_text: "Scrap metal and chequered patterns. But of course. It's an unspoken rite of passage for a Cold Trader to fleece an Ork at least once."

traits.locale_text: «Chatarra con diseño a cuadros. Claro. Cualquier Comerciante Frío que se precie ha estado al menos una vez a un orko».

languages.text: “金属废料和格子花纹。当然，对于冷市商人而言，每个人都得至少敲诈兽人一次，这是我们心照不宣的成人仪式。”
languages.original_text: "Scrap metal and chequered patterns. But of course. It's an unspoken rite of passage for a Cold Trader to fleece an Ork at least once."

traits.locale_text: “金属废料和格子花纹。当然，对于冷市商人而言，每个人都得至少敲诈兽人一次，这是我们心照不宣的成人仪式。”

languages.text: « De la ferraille et des motifs à damier. Mais oui, tout spécialiste du Commerce Froid se doit de plumer un Ork au moins une fois dans sa vie. C'est un rite de passage tacite. »
languages.original_text: "Scrap metal and chequered patterns. But of course. It's an unspoken rite of passage for a Cold Trader to fleece an Ork at least once."

traits.locale_text: « De la ferraille et des motifs à damier. Mais oui, tout spécialiste du Commerce Froid se doit de plumer un Ork au moins une fois dans sa vie. C'est un rite de passage tacite. »

languages.text: "Altmetall und karierte Muster. Natürlich. Es ist ein inoffizieller Übergangsritus für jeden Kalthändler, zumindest einmal einen Ork auszunehmen."
languages.original_text: "Scrap metal and chequered patterns. But of course. It's an unspoken rite of passage for a Cold Trader to fleece an Ork at least once."

traits.locale_text: "Altmetall und karierte Muster. Natürlich. Es ist ein inoffizieller Übergangsritus für jeden Kalthändler, zumindest einmal einen Ork auszunehmen."

languages.text: "Hurda metal ve ekoseli desenler. Başka ne olacaktı? Soğuk Tacirlerin bir kez olsun Ork kazıklaması, söze dökülmemiş bir geçiş törenidir."
languages.original_text: "Scrap metal and chequered patterns. But of course. It's an unspoken rite of passage for a Cold Trader to fleece an Ork at least once."
